statements: SELECT * FROM environmental_impact WHERE carbon_footprint > 10
SELECT product_name, packaging_material, packaging_weight FROM environmental_impact
SELECT id, carbon_footprint FROM environmental_impact WHERE packaging_weight < 0.5
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact ORDER BY packaging_weight DESC
SELECT DISTINCT packaging_material FROM environmental_impact
SELECT product_name, carbon_footprint FROM environmental_impact WHERE packaging_material = 'Plastic'
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact WHERE carbon_footprint > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, packaging_weight, carbon_footprint FROM environmental_impact ORDER BY packaging_weight ASC, carbon_footprint DESC
SELECT AVG(packaging_weight), MAX(carbon_footprint) FROM environmental_impact WHERE recycling_code IN ('1', '2', '5')
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM environmental_impact
SELECT * FROM PackagingMaterials;
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint FROM PackagingMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM PackagingMaterials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint FROM PackagingMaterials WHERE carbon_footprint > 100;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ProductPackaging;
SELECT * FROM PackagingMaterials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM PackagingMaterials WHERE carbon_footprint > 100;
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_type FROM PackagingMaterials ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductPackaging WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100;

SELECT material_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM ProductPackaging JOIN PackagingMaterials ON ProductPackaging.material_id = PackagingMaterials.material_id GROUP BY material_name HAVING total_quantity > 200;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM Product ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM PackagingMaterials WHERE recyclable = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM PackagingMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY material_name;

SELECT p.product_name, pm.material_name, ei.impact_score FROM Product p JOIN EnvironmentalImpact ei ON p.product_id = ei.product_id JOIN PackagingMaterials pm ON ei.material_id = pm.material_id WHERE ei.impact_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, weight FROM Product WHERE weight > 1.5;
SELECT p.product_name, pm.material_name FROM Product p INNER JOIN PackagingMaterials pm ON p.packaging_material = pm.material_name;
SELECT AVG(impact_score), MAX(impact_score) FROM EnvironmentalImpact WHERE product_id = 1 GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT p.product_name, COUNT(e.impact_id) FROM Product p LEFT JOIN EnvironmentalImpact e ON p.product_id = e.product_id GROUP BY p.product_name;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT id, material_name, material_type FROM packaging_materials WHERE impact_factor > 0.5;
SELECT product_name, product_category, packaging_material_id FROM products WHERE id = 3;
SELECT product_name, product_category, packaging_materials.material_name FROM products JOIN packaging_materials ON products.packaging_material_id = packaging_materials.id;
SELECT shipments.id, ship_date, quantity, products.product_name FROM shipments JOIN products ON shipments.product_id = products.id;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT id, material_name, material_type FROM packaging_materials WHERE id=1;
SELECT product_name, product_category, p.material_name FROM products JOIN packaging_materials p ON products.packaging_material_id = p.id ORDER BY product_category DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, e.impact_score FROM products p LEFT JOIN environmental_impact e ON p.id = e.product_id WHERE e.impact_score > 0.5;
SELECT s.product_id, COUNT(s.id) as num_shipments FROM shipments s GROUP BY s.product_id HAVING num_shipments > 3 ORDER BY num_shipments DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, recyclable FROM packaging_materials WHERE material_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM product_information ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact WHERE environmental_score > 5;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM product_information WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT material_name, material_type, recyclable FROM packaging_materials WHERE recyclable = TRUE;
SELECT p.product_name, e.impact_type, i.impact_value FROM product_information p JOIN product_impact i ON p.product_id = i.product_id JOIN environmental_impact e ON i.impact_id = e.impact_id;
SELECT p.product_name, COUNT(u.feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM product_information p LEFT JOIN user_feedback u ON p.product_id = u.user_id GROUP BY p.product_name;
